head.title: COVID-19 Daily Community Update - 4.2.20 - Jeffco Public Schools

meta.content: Jeffco Public Schools has been providing educational excellence since 1950. Our mission is to provide a quality education that prepares all children for a successful future.

div.span: TIPS FOR PROOFING YOUR HOME TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF COVID-19
from Jeffco Public Schools Department of Health Services

table.style: border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium; min-width: 100%;

td.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; line-height: 1.2; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(64, 63, 66); display: block; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 10px 20px;

div.span: There are many things you can do to help stop the spread of COVID-19 and keep your home environment safe. Take a moment to review
from our department of health services.

table.style: border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium; min-width: 100%;

div.span: To better serve the Jeffco community and to accommodate the large numbers of meals we are serving, we are moving some of our grab-and-go meal sites. All site location changes will be

span.style: font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(245, 239, 85); color: rgb(64, 63, 84);

table.style: border-collapse: collapse; table-layout: fixed; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: medium; min-width: 100%;

td.style: -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; line-height: 1.2; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(64, 63, 66); display: block; overflow-wrap: break-word; padding: 10px 20px;

span.style: text-decoration-line: underline; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(103, 55, 133);

div.span: Site Location Changes starting Monday, April 6

ul.li: Arvada K-8 moves to Arvada High (enter on West 66th Ave.)
Bear Creek High will open as a NEW grab-and-go site (enter on Dartmouth Pl.)
Edgewater Elementary moves to Jefferson Jr/Sr High (enter from 24th Ave.)
Foothills Elementary moves to Dunstan Middle (enter from S. Wright St.)
Lasley Elementary - CLOSING as grab-and-go site. Please visit Alameda High for meals.
Parr Elementary moves to Pomona High (enter from Pomona Dr.)
Welchester Elementary moves to Golden High (enter from 24th St.)
Sites will still be open Monday, Wednesday, Friday, 10:30am - 1:00pm
Meals are available at no cost to all children 1-18 years old
Meals will be served at a curbside location and put into the car trunk, through the car window, or handed off by walk-up.
Parents and caregivers can pick up meals for children who are sick or cannot be present for other reasons. We will ask for and write down names of children who are not present to receive meals.
Please do not come to the sites if you are sick.

div.div: ...that Jeffco Makes provides new activities each Tuesday to drive creativity while at home?
... that school closures were extended once again?

div.span: WANT TO HELP FAMILIES IMPACTED BY COVID-19?
Jeffco Schools Foundation has a designated fund for Jeffco Public Schools.

div.span: Jeffco Public Schools has been providing educational excellence since 1950. Our mission is to provide a quality education that prepares all children for a successful future.
div.div: Title IX requires school districts to designate at least one employee as their Title IX Coordinator. Jeffco Public Schools has designated District Title IX Coordinator, Kristin Moulton.
